time.name: Start of observation time of the first BRC (UTC)

num_of_valid_rayleigh_results.name: Number of valid Rayleigh ISR results

mie_valid.name: TRUE if Mie data is available to compute the ISR result. FALSE only when ALL Mie pulses were eliminated due to corruption or invalid pulse for ALL Mie pulses

rayleigh_valid.name: TRUE if Rayleigh data is available to compute the ISR result. FALSE only when ALL Mie pulses were eliminated due to corruption or invalid pulse for ALL Rayleigh pulses
